code: import React from'react';import{useRef}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var RegisterForm=function RegisterForm(_ref){var addUser=_ref.addUser;var nameInputRef=useRef();var emailInputRef=useRef();var passwordInputRef=useRef();var registerUser=function registerUser(e){e.preventDefault();var enteredName=nameInputRef.current.value.toString();var enteredEmail=emailInputRef.current.value.toString();var enteredPassword=passwordInputRef.current.value.toString();var entered={'name':enteredName,'email':enteredEmail,'password':enteredPassword};var user=JSON.stringify(entered);addUser(user);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"w-50 mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:nameInputRef,type:"text",className:"form-control my-3",name:"name",placeholder:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:emailInputRef,type:"email",className:"form-control my-3",name:"email",placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:passwordInputRef,type:"password",className:"form-control my-3",name:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary w-100",onClick:registerUser})]});};export default RegisterForm;
